MARILYN MANSON built his entire career on shocking audiences.

articles.title: The Weeknd's Super Bowl halftime show to be performed completely live - NME
articles.description: The Weeknd is set to provide the entertainment at this weekend's Tampa Bay vs Kansas Super Bowl, and will perform entirely live.
articles.content:
The Weeknd‘s performance at the Super Bowl halftime show this weekend will be performed entirely live.
The Canadian artist, real name Abel Tesfaye, is this year’s guest performer during the much-hyp… [+1840 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Britt
articles.title: 'Mandalorian' Season 3 might fix the Star Wars sequels, Favreau hints - Inverse
articles.description: The new Star Wars shows are like the prequels of the 2020s, with the potential to explain all backstories the sequel movies left wide open.
articles.content:
Disney will never erase the Star Wars sequel trilogy.
As much as toxic Star Wars fandom focuses their weird hate on the creative decisions behind the sequel films The Force Awakens, The Last Jedi, a… [+5550 chars]
